body: Why would you be so mean to your own uncle??? That doesn't make any sense if he was acting normal and not creepy at all.
Wtf is an uncle doing reading porn

Niecefucker... Dude I'll kill this bastard cuz I'm an uncle myself and I love my nieces but would never do such things to them... Ah.. haha... it's 2D hahaha. Anyway, besides the silly story, this has some pretty artwork for your fapping needs LOL.
The "Why uncle raped me meme" turned into a doujinshi. Nice
